name: Blue Mountain Fire
description: A sativa strain with Jamaican roots, Blue Mountain Fire is an invigorating, upbeat variety that coerces creativity and happy mindsets. When grown outdoors, Blue Mountain Fire can tower with impressive heights and yields. Its high-energy buzz is perfect for motivating the mind and fighting fatigue, but those prone to anxiety may feel overwhelmed by the fast-paced euphoria this sativa has to offer.Â
attributes_title: Euphoric, Relaxed, Tingly, Uplifted, Happy, Depression, Stress, Eye Pressure, Fatigue, Pain, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Headache, Paranoid
